verses.verse: While I <S%H2416>live<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto my God while I have any <S%H430>being<s%>.
Put not your <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H5081>princes<s%>, Nor in the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, in whom there is no <S%H8668>help<s%>.
His <S%H7307>breath<s%> goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%>, he <S%H7725>returneth<s%> to his <S%H127>earth<s%>; In that very <S%H3117>day<s%> his <S%H6250>thoughts<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>.
Happy <S%H835><s%> is he that hath the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for his <S%H5828>help<s%>, Whose <S%H7664>hope<s%> is in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>:
Who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>, The <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and all that in them <S%H8104>is<s%>; Who keepeth <S%H571>truth<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>;

Who <S%H6213>executeth<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> for the <S%H6231>oppressed<s%>; Who <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry<s%>. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5425>looseth<s%> the <S%H631>prisoners<s%>;

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H6491>openeth<s%> the eyes of the <S%H5787>blind<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2210>raiseth<s%> up them that are bowed <S%H3721>down<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>;

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> the <S%H1616>sojourners<s%>; He <S%H5749>upholdeth<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widow<s%>; But the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> he turneth upside <S%H5791>down<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H4427>reign<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, Thy <S%H430>God<s%>, O <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, unto <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
